DOC.detailed_description: The overarching study aim recruit enroll population current smoker motivate quit assistance mobile solution . The core study period consist 8 week iPhone program usage . Comprehensive questionnaire give user course application usage . Users receive notification link online survey , record response secure database . Following 8-week core study , participant may continue usage program . During course use program , participant ask provide information regard three general area regular basis part use app : smoking status , adherence self physician-directed quit plan ( include limit medication smoke cessation over-the-counter quit aid ) , overall user satisfaction . One way program assess area involve ask user answer question address whether user use nicotine last 24 hour . At end week , user also ask report cigarette count past 7 day , use standardized reporting technique call Timeline Followback ( TLFB ) Method Assessment ( Sobell , 1992 ) . At 16-week mark 24-week mark enrollment , user receive brief questionnaire retrospectively look cigarette usage , adherence quit aid , physical symptom nicotine withdrawal .
